Package de.oth.blocklib.networking

Interface NetworkConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientNetworkManager, NioNetworkConnection
public interface NetworkConnection
Encapsulates a connection between two endpoints.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  NetworkConnection.ConnectionState  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    NetworkConnection.ConnectionState getConnectionState()
    Gets the connection's state.
    java.net.InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
    Gets the address of the connection's local endpoint.
    java.net.InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
    Gets the address of the connection's remote endpoint.
    int getRoundTripTime()
    Returns the measured round trip time.
    boolean isConnected()
    Return whether the connection is intact.
    This depends on whether data was received from the remote endpoint in the last Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout milliseconds.
    void send​(NetworkMessage message)
    Send a message to the server the NetworkManager is connected to.
    Does nothing if the NetworkManager is not connected.

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send​(NetworkMessage message)
      Send a message to the server the NetworkManager is connected to.
      Does nothing if the NetworkManager is not connected.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Return whether the connection is intact.
      This depends on whether data was received from the remote endpoint in the last Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout milliseconds. If Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout is 0, this method returns true.
      Returns:
      true if the two endpoints are still connected

    • getLocalAddress

      java.net.InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
      Gets the address of the connection's local endpoint.
      Returns:
      the local address or null if an error occurred

    • getRemoteAddress

      java.net.InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Gets the address of the connection's remote endpoint.
      Returns:
      the remote address or null if an error occurred

    • getConnectionState

      NetworkConnection.ConnectionState getConnectionState()
      Gets the connection's state.
      Returns:
      the connection's current state.

    • getRoundTripTime

      int getRoundTripTime()
      Returns the measured round trip time.
